name: not too far
description:
a short narrative experience about safe places,

sharing them,

being seen.

made in a day for Yeet Riksen Jam 🏳️‍⚧️

———

trans and non-binary people in norway deserve access to better and safer healthcare options. NBTS' treatment monopoly is dangerous and greatly ignores the voices of people sharing their stories.

so let's YEET RIKSEN
